title: Tegma - Lo-Fi Adventures - 2008
description:
Since the late 90&#039;s, Omar Chelly and Jason         

              Orfanidis were in the forefront of the new wave    

              of Scandinavian progressive/minimal trance.        

                                                                

              With over fifty released productions, three        

              full-length albums and years of live performing    

              at major festivals and events in all corners of    

              the world, Tegma has grown into one of the key     

              players of the current progressive scene.          

                                                                 

              After almost two years since the legendary record  

              &#039;Around the World in 80 Minutes&#039;, Tegma is coming  

              back to the spotlight with the release of the      

              fourth album.                                      

                                                                 

              &#039;Lo-Fi Adventures&#039; brings you a unique blend of    

              progressive trance with psychedelic roots and      

              modern club music.                                 

                                                                 

              Whether it&#039;s a packed club, sunny open air or      

              your fancy car, expect a pure Lo-Fi experience in  

              HQ implementation!                                 

                                                                 

                    link: www.tegmatekk.com                      



01  In All Ears                        08:33

02  East Block (Cccp Mix)              07:27   

03  Circles                            07:49    

04  Computer Disorder                  07:31     

05  Who Stole My Oscillator            08:05     

06  Monday Star                        08:16     

07  What The Fuzz                      08:28     

08  Twister                            07:21     

09  Crank Up                           06:48     

10  Lo-Fi Adventures                   06:41
